title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and social activities based on my interests so that I can engage with my community and maintain social connections without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Social Engagement Notifications
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to send me reminders about local events and activities so that I can stay socially connected and participate in family activities without feeling monitored.

title: Family and Caregiver Communication Support
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily communicate with my family and caregivers through ALFRED so that I feel connected and supported without feeling monitored.

title: User-Friendly Event Scheduling
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to help me schedule and remind me of social events so that I can maintain my social connections and participate in family activities without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Social Activity Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest local social activities based on my interests so that I can stay engaged and connected with my family and community without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities that match my interests so that I can stay socially engaged without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Social Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to provide feedback on social activities suggested by ALFRED so that I can refine future recommendations and feel more engaged without feeling monitored.

title: Group Communication Support
summary: As an active retiree, I want to easily connect with my family and friends through group messages or video calls, so that I can stay socially engaged without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Interest-Based Community Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest community events that match my interests so that I can engage socially without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.
